body.p:
The processes most editor variables. However, the following categories of editor variables are not supported in :
Editor variables related with functionality that is not available in the , such as ${dbgXML} or ${dbgXSL}.
Editor variables related with project location, such as ${pdu}, ${pd}, or ${pn}.
Any editor variable that displays Java Swing-based components, such as ${ask}.
Editor variables related with the standalone installation directory, such as ${oxygenHome} or ${oxygenInstallDir}.
